- **Row 14, 15, 16**: Actors in "Centovetrine" - All have continuous roles from 2001.

### Step 5: Verify Other Characters in the Same Show
We focus on other characters in "Un Posto al Sole":

- **Row 17**: Nina Soldano (Marina Giordano) - "2003-", continuous without breaks.
- **Row 18**: Delia Boccardo (Tilly Nardi) is from a different soap opera, "Incantesimo", so not relevant.

### Conclusion
Marina Tagliaferri and Claudia Ruffo are the only actors in "Un Posto al Sole" who left their roles and returned later. No other characters in the show have this pattern.
